tool_description: Get sub-city level individual per-capita USD/yr income data from across the globe. Useful in LTV & user valuation modeling.

api_list.name: World Coordinate to Income
api_list.description: Retrieve granular city per capita income based on geographical coordinates.

required_parameters.name: lon
required_parameters.description: Longitude of the location for which income data is requested.

required_parameters.name: lat
required_parameters.description: Latitude of the location for which income data is requested.
